response.answer_text: Wearing masks was considered as anti-trump as he himself, being the President of America who was expected to wear a mask and set an example to his people, had not worn one since the outbreak of coronavirus in the US.However, it is not considered as as anti-Trump as Trump was seen wearing a mask a couple of days back as he finally budged to the pressure of his doctors after not heeding their advice several times.
